Articles.Content:
Like the title says.

I play ksp 32bit modded, before I never had problems now sometimes it crashes.

Where can I get help to know whats the problem is? Can this file (or others) tell someone if it's the game crashing or mods giving problems?

All mods are updated to .25.

Thank you.
You should post in the "Support (modded installs)" sub-forum, making sure that you read and follow the instructions in the "How to get support" sticky thread in that sub-forum...
That file is very useful for determining what causes crashes. Post it in the support sub-forum with as much info as you can.
Thank you both. I will do.
